articles.description: The Masked Singer viewers got a big shock on Saturday night when both Robin and Badger sounded drastically different
articles.content:
Masked Singer fans' heads were scrambled on Saturday night as both Robin and Badger 'completely changed' their voices in the semi-final.
Just five acts were left in the running this weekend and it w… [+1903 chars]
